name: Truck Driver Simulator
description:
BigCode Games welcomes you to a new adventure of Truck Simulation. Experience the new driving experience in truck simulator game. Play as a truck driver & drive through the different routes & paths to reach the destination. Drive across the hills and difficult paths around the city.   Truck Driver Simulator Game Features:   -Realistic Truck Driver Experience with HD graphics & sounds. -Amazing simulation experience with smooth controls. -Best Truck Simulator game with leader boards achievements. -Lots of Heavy trucks to upgrade.

  Please rate and leave comment if you like our new game; Truck Driver Simulator! 
 Thank you & have fun!
